amendment.description: To limit the availability of funds for canceling large contracts without prior notice and explanation to Congress.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3433 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3433 proposed by Senator Collins for Senator Blumenthal to Amendment SA 3411.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3433 proposed by Senator Collins for Senator Blumenthal to Amendment SA 3411.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3433 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
